trans-unit.source:
\n

Controls the system garbage collector, a service that automatically reclaims unused memory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ x xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the maximum number of generations that the system currently supports.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A value that ranges from zero to the maximum number of supported generations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Informs the runtime of a large allocation of unmanaged memory that should be taken into account when scheduling garbage collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The incremental amount of unmanaged memory that has been allocated.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Forces an immediate garbage collection of all generations.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Forces an immediate garbage collection from generation 0 through a specified generation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx 0 xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of the oldest generation to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ngeneration is not valid.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of the oldest generation to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of the oldest generation to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: true to perform a blocking garbage collection; false to perform a background garbage collection where possible.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the number of times garbage collection has occurred for the specified generation of objects.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The generation of objects for which the garbage collection count is to be determined.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of times garbage collection has occurred for the specified generation since the process was started.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ngeneration is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx 0.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the current generation number of the specified object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object that generation information is retrieved for.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The current generation number of obj.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx $xx$xxx$$xx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Retrieves the number of bytes currently thought to be allocated.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
A parameter indicates whether this method can wait a short interval before returning, to allow the system to collect garbage and finalize objects.

\n
trans-unit.target: X xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true to indicate that this method can wait for garbage collection to occur before returning; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A number that is the best available approximation of the number of bytes currently allocated in managed memory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

References the specified object, which makes it ineligible for garbage collection from the start of the current routine to the point where this method is called.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object to reference.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Informs the runtime that unmanaged memory has been released and no longer needs to be taken into account when scheduling garbage collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The amount of unmanaged memory that has been released.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object that a finalizer must be called for.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nobj is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Requests that the common language runtime not call the finalizer for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object whose finalizer must not be executed.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nobj is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Suspends the current thread until the thread that is processing the queue of finalizers has emptied that queue.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
